title: Reference fasta requires a fai and dict index
body:
Create a step to create those indices required by GATK and Picard.

> samtools faidx Lb.Hardjo.L550.fasta
> java -jar /opt/picard-tools-2.2.1/picard.jar CreateSequenceDictionary R=Lb.Hardjo.JB197.fasta O=Lb.Hardjo.JB197.dict

title: snappy* temporary file ...
body: Add a line in scvc preprocess_bam to delete the snappy*.so file created by Picard.

title: Samtools wrapper only works for haploid genomes
body: Samtools ploidy parameter does not expect a numeric value, when other than 1. Instead it expects a list with a ploidy value per chromosome.
